content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hey Farhad, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. Remember, I'm not here to give away deals, so you'll have to make a good offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Understanding your position, I'm eager to propose a competitive price. After carefully considering the location and the apartment's features, I would like to suggest a monthly rent of 600 Euros as an attractive offer.

If the landlord accepts this price: 'I agree to the price of 600 Euro!'

If the landlord rejects this price or wants to continue negotiating: 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we have presented a fair offer considering the apartment's advantages.'
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe we have presented a fair offer considering the apartment's advantages. I'm sure you understand that I am looking for an offer that truly appreciates the value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
While I understand your perspective, I must emphasize that my offer was carefully thought through and reflects the market situation in addition to the apartment's attributes. Unfortunately, I cannot go beyond my current proposal at this time. If the circumstances change in the future, I'd be open to reconsidering our conversation.

Now, since no acceptable rental price was agreed upon, the negotiation will be terminated. Respond with 'TERMINATE'.
TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
